Definition: Outlines the objective for the business (mission statement), vision, location and ownership type (e.g. partnership or limited company)
Research on the size of the market, different segments and characteristics of the chosen target market

4 Ps for a good/service:
- Product: USP, branding
- Place: channel of distribution
- Price: strategy (e.g. premium, penetration)
- Promotion: advertising, sales promotion

Time/labour/materials/machinery required for production (per unit)
Production process: job/batch/mass
Cash flow forecast, long-term finance (debt/equity), break-even analysis
